author: Tim McGovern
title: Chance The Rapper Sold Out Lollapalooza 2017 So Fast And Fans Are Heartbroken
text:
Chance the Rapper is the hero Chicago deserves. 
So, it would make complete sense Saturday tickets for the Windy City‚Äôs music festival Lollapalooza would quickly sell out after Chance the Rapper was named a headliner for that day. 
Basically, this is the best lineup for a festival I‚Äôve seen in a while. Aside from Oldchella. And the concert involving the Beatles, Wolf Amadeus Mozart‚Äôs piano recital and Elvis I‚Äôll experience when I get into heaven. Naturally, everyone was pretty upset they wouldn‚Äôt have the chance (nailed it!) to see their favorite rapper. The only day I want to go to Lolla, it's sold out. I just want to see @chancetherapper The despair on Twitter is very real. Judging by the emojis used, people are crying. A lot. @chancetherapper @ronnponn when Saturday has already sold out I think we lost our chance üôÅ 
‚Äî Vanessa Shelton (@VanessaWhistler) March 22, 2017 At least, someone is taking the news somewhat well. The day @chancetherapper will be at #Lollapalooza already sold out!!! Why am I not surprised?! pic.twitter.com/HQQhgWIW7I Hey, Lyanna, don‚Äôt blame Chance. YOU DON‚ÄôT WANT NO PROBLEM, WANT NO PROBLEM WITH CHANCE. Who am I kidding? Chance is the nicest guy. Thanks @chancetherapper for making Saturday sold out :(( Where have I seen this reaction before? Saturday Lolla tickets sold out. N @chancetherapper
